SCTX:
begin TestRefRotate

float timer
short on

if ( MenuMode == 0 )

	if ( OnActivate == 1)
		
		if ( on == 0 )

			set on to 1

		endif

	endif

	if ( on == 1 )
		
		if ( timer < 5 )

			Todd->rotate, z, 45      ;using Todd as my referenced object for testing
			set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )

		else

			;reset everything
			set timer to 0
			set on to 0

		endif

	endif

endif

end
